thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Mark Simmons
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Mark Simmons

author: Mark Simmons
title: Mark Simmons
text: I've probably purchased 10 or so items from this site. Things that I've either not seen from other vendors, or things that are much more expensive elsewhere. I've been happy with delivery and consistently good quality products. From "bare bones" subassembly electronics, optics, and after-market devices, there are a lot of cool "techie" items.
